data.title: Clifford Simak
data.meta_description: Edition: First Edition Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good Jacket Condition: Very Good Binding: Hardcover
data.text:
Simak, Clifford

City

Edition: First Edition

Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good

Jacket Condition: Very Good

Binding: Hardcover

Stated First Edition, First Printing. Not price-clipped ($2.75 price intact). Published by Gnome Press, 1952. Octavo. Light green cloth boards stamped in black. Signed and inscribed by Clifford Simak on title page, To T-, I am glad to occasionally see a first edition - Clifford D. Simak . Book is very good; clean with no writing or names. Binding tight and pages crisp. Spine straight and corners sharp. Has some light wear to board edges. Dust jacket is very good with some light shelf wear and a few tiny nicks. A superb copy of this landmark science-fiction novel. Jacket artwork by Frank Kelly Freas (misspelled as Frease ) on left flap. Very scarce signed. Book has been placed in a custom acetate protector. 224 pages.

100% positive feedback. 30 day money back guarantee. NEXT DAY SHIPPING! Excellent customer service. Please email with any questions or if you would like a photo. All books packed carefully and ship with free delivery confirmation/tracking. All books come with free bookmarks. Ships from Southampton, New York.

Item #88667
